title: Ticket #1753: condor_reconfig usage info cannot be correct (man page even worse)
description:
It trying to write manual subsection 3.10.2 (Reconfiguring a Condor Pool), I tried to check details by looking at the condor_reconfig man page. It is inadequate, and cannot be correct. Double checking with the usage info (v7.4.4) online (condor_reconfig -help), I notice that the usage info is also incorrect.

The task is to correct the usage info, and then to help Karen correct the manual page.
creator: smoler
